basics.name: Markus Berglund
basics.label: Konsultkooperativet
basics.summary: Markus is a technical consultant with experience within a broad range of technologies and businesses. Markus is a certified (PMP) project manager, having lead research projects for next generation mobile networks, as well as product development within internet safety and security.  Markus has very good communications skills, and often takes a leading role in teams. Comfortable in working in on many platforms, in agile teams. Very well structured and organized.

work.summary: Technical project manager for a team of researchers researching technologies for the next generation mobile systems, focusing on Massive MIMO antenna systems. Project included 25 highly skilled PhD's and MSc's, and resulted in several patent applications.
highlights: 5G Research project with regular contacts with HQ in Shanghai, China

work.summary: Co-Founder of CronLab in 2009. I managed the technical development within the company. I recruited the development team in our Gothenburg office. Our software is used in products sold all over the world, e.g. the Kurio Android tablet designed specifically for kids.
highlights: The filtering service has over 1,000,000 users worldwide

work.summary: DSP Software designer and architect, developing the next generation of Radio Base Station software for the 3G network.
highlights: Designed and implemented one of the key memory allocators for the baseband chips
Managed the integration of the different software modules

work.summary: Worked within Ericsson's 3G base station L1 software, fixing bugs and implementing features.

education.gpa: FInished first in my class, 6 months ahead of time
C++ specifics for embedded systems with very limited resources

awards.title: Project Manager Professional
awards.summary: Certified project manager professional by the Project Management Institute

references.name: Michael Wallenius
references.reference: Markus is an extremely sharp and intelligent person with a broad competence ranging from technology to starting a business. On the social side he shares his elegant humor to all around him when there is time for fun. As an entrepreneurial CTO he has been one of the best I've ever met.
